arts.ttl: Barry Ferguson pinpoints exact moment Rangers sparked into life after nightmare start against Kilmarnock
arts.sum: The new Ibrox boss watched his side roar back from two goals down and reflected on a manic dug-out debut

arts.ttl: Rangers recover from 2-0 down at Kilmarnock to give Barry Ferguson winning start
arts.sum: Gers trailed 2-0 after 14 minutes at Rugby Park.

arts.ttl: 49ers' Marathe 'always looking at opportunities' amid Rangers takeover rumours
arts.sum: San Francisco 49ers' Paraag Marathe says they are "always looking at other opportunities" after it emerged American investors are in talks with Rangers over a multi-million-pound takeover.

arts.ttl: Paraag Marathe breaks Rangers takeover silence as 49ers supremo reveals search for club to replicate Leeds success
arts.sum: Marathe wants to use some of that wealth to help transform the fortunes of Rangers

arts.ttl: Celtic legend's savage response to Barry Ferguson's appointment as Rangers boss
arts.sum: Barry Ferguson has taken over as interim boss at Rangers until the end of the season, and the former Gers captain has been joined by Neil McCann, Billy Dodds and Allan McGregor

arts.ttl: Nick Walsh to make Rangers return after Mohamed Diomande red card controversy as referee put in Ibrox firing line
arts.sum: It's his first involvement with the Ibrox club since that game with Dundee United at Tannadice

arts.ttl: 49ers role in Rangers sacking Philippe Clement 'revealed' as Ibrox involvement starts before takeover
arts.sum: The Belgian saw his spell as boss come to an end on Sunday with defeat to St Mirren proving one step too far

arts.ttl: Steven Gerrard's true thoughts on Rangers return as Ally McCoist reveals his worries
arts.sum: A sensational return to Rangers could be on the cards for Steven Gerrard, who is a free agent after leaving Al-Ettifaq last month following Philippe Clement's Ibrox dismissal

arts.ttl: Steven Gerrard's stance on Rangers return, Barry Ferguson's emotional response and Ally McCoist fears
arts.sum: It's all change at Rangers once again after Philippe Clement was given his marching orders, with the club now on the hunt for the Belgian's permanent replacement
